name: UNRAVEN
description:
In this shoot 'em up intensive game, you are able to test your motor skills, you must dodge missiles and enemies and try to survive as far as you can.

The daughter asks her father, who is a wizard, for a man to date, but he doesn't accept and curses him, turning him into a crow, and suddenly reality is distorted at dusk and he will have to face strange creatures and monsters  forever (long time).

The game has a highscore system, making it more immersive and competitive. The game gets a lot more difficult as time goes on, so get ready! How far can you go?

CONTROLS:

Keyboard:

  • W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys -> Move;
  • K -> Shoot;
  • J -> Throw firefly;
  • L -> Dash;
  • Enter -> Pause;
  • Space -> Confirm.

Gamepad:

  • Left Axis -> Move;
  • X (square) -> Shoot;
  • B (circle) -> Throw Firefly;
  • Y (triangle) -> Dash;
  • Start -> Pause.

(Gamepad is automatically detected when pressing any key - You can use keyboard and gamepad simultaneously)
